original_text: And the number of the days that David lived in the country of the Philistines was a year and four months.
korean_text: 다윗이 블레셋 사람들의 지방에 산 날 수는 일 년 사 개월이었더라

sentences.original_text: And the number of the days
that David lived in the country of the Philistines
was a year and four months.
